dao.dto: select ID , NAME , ABBREVIATION from TEST.STATE

sql.statement: select ID , NAME , ABBREVIATION from TEST.STATE where ID=:id
insert into TEST.STATE ( NAME , ABBREVIATION ) values ( :name , :abbreviation )
update TEST.STATE set NAME =:name , ABBREVIATION =:abbreviation where ID=:id
delete from TEST.STATE where ID=:id
select ID , NAME , ABBREVIATION from TEST.STATE where ID = (select max(ID) from STATE)
delete from TEST.STATE where ID > :id

dao.dto: select ID , NAME , FOUNDED_YEAR , END_YEAR from TEST.PARTY

sql.statement: select ID , NAME , FOUNDED_YEAR , END_YEAR from TEST.PARTY where ID=:id
insert into TEST.PARTY ( NAME , FOUNDED_YEAR , END_YEAR ) values ( :name , :foundedYear , :endYear )
update TEST.PARTY set NAME =:name , FOUNDED_YEAR =:foundedYear , END_YEAR =:endYear where ID=:id
delete from TEST.PARTY where ID=:id
select ID , NAME , FOUNDED_YEAR , END_YEAR from TEST.PARTY where ID = (select max(ID) from PARTY)
delete from TEST.PARTY where ID > :id

dao.dto: select ID , FIRSTNAME , LASTNAME , STATE_ID , PARTY_ID , INAUGURATED_YEAR , YEARS from TEST.PRESIDENT

sql.statement: select ID , FIRSTNAME , LASTNAME , STATE_ID , PARTY_ID , INAUGURATED_YEAR , YEARS from TEST.PRESIDENT where ID=:id and STATE_ID=:stateId
insert into TEST.PRESIDENT ( FIRSTNAME , LASTNAME , STATE_ID , PARTY_ID , INAUGURATED_YEAR , YEARS ) values ( :firstname , :lastname , :stateId , :partyId , :inauguratedYear , :years )
update TEST.PRESIDENT set FIRSTNAME =:firstname , LASTNAME =:lastname , PARTY_ID =:partyId , INAUGURATED_YEAR =:inauguratedYear , YEARS =:years where ID=:id and STATE_ID=:stateId
delete from TEST.PRESIDENT where ID=:id and STATE_ID=:stateId
select ID , FIRSTNAME , LASTNAME , STATE_ID , PARTY_ID , INAUGURATED_YEAR , YEARS from TEST.PRESIDENT where ID = (select max(ID) from PRESIDENT)
select ID , FIRSTNAME , LASTNAME , STATE_ID , PARTY_ID , INAUGURATED_YEAR , YEARS from TEST.PRESIDENT where STATE_ID = (select max(STATE_ID) from PRESIDENT)
delete from TEST.PRESIDENT where ID > :id
delete from TEST.PRESIDENT where STATE_ID > :stateId
SELECT * FROM PRESIDENT
SELECT * FROM PRESIDENTS_VIEW
